title: How to Track Your Order
text: To track your TCS order, use the unique tracking ID sent to you via SMS or email after shipment. Visit our website at www.tcs.com/track, enter the ID, and view real-time status updates including location and estimated arrival. For assistance, contact support at 0800-12345. Policy: Tracking is available 24/7 for all domestic shipments.

title: What Does 'In Transit' Status Mean?
text: The 'In Transit' status indicates your package is en route to the delivery hub or final destination. It typically updates every 4-6 hours. If no updates for 24 hours, it may be held at a sorting facility. Policy: TCS guarantees updates at least once per day during transit; delays beyond 48 hours qualify for investigation.

title: Tracking International Shipments
text: For international orders, tracking starts once the package leaves Pakistan customs. Use the same tracking ID on our site or partner carriers like DHL. Expect delays at borders. Policy: International tracking is limited to major routes; full visibility resumes post-customs clearance within 2-3 days.

title: Tracking ID Validity and Security
text: Tracking IDs are 12-digit alphanumeric codes valid for 90 days post-delivery. Share only with authorized parties to prevent fraud. Policy: Unauthorized access attempts are reported; customers must verify ID via official channels. Lost IDs can be retrieved via support ticket with order number.

title: No Tracking Updates Available
text: If no updates show, check your spam folder for the initial email or re-enter the ID. Common issues include early shipment stages. Policy: Refunds for non-tracking are not issued; contact support for manual status checks within 24 hours.

title: Tracking During Peak Seasons
text: During holidays (e.g., Eid, Independence Day), updates may be delayed by 12-24 hours due to high volume. Policy: PakShip commits to 95% on-time updates; extended delays trigger automatic notifications and compensation for verified impacts.

title: Multiple Packages in One Order
text: Orders with multiple items may have separate tracking IDs if shipped separately. Check your order confirmation email. Policy: Consolidated tracking is provided for bundled shipments; split shipments notify via SMS.

title: App-Based Tracking
text: Download the PakShip app for push notifications on status changes. Scan QR code from email for instant tracking. Policy: App usage is optional; web tracking remains primary for all users.
